item.description:
Sorry for the short notice but....
Let's meet on Marshfield side of Union street bridge over North River. We did this earlier in the season. Weather should be low 60's with light wind. We will head inland with incoming HIGH tide. Stop and have lunch and then retrun with the tide. Foliage should be nice. bathing suits optional! Total trip time will be between 3 and 4 hours!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Final Kayak trip North River Saturday 10/27 in Water @ 11:00AM
